title: 2001년 Hurst 사건
summary: 미국 Missouri, MO 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Hurst. 판결일: 2001-04-10. 법원: Missouri Court of Appeals.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: STATE of Missouri v. Jayson D. HURST
**판결일**: 2001-04-10
**법원**: Missouri Court of Appeals
**관할**: Missouri, MO

**판사**: Howard, Smart, Spinden

## 변호인

John M. Schilmoeller, Assistant Appellate Defender, Kansas City, MO, Attorney for Appellant., Jeremiah W. (Jay) Nixon, Attorney General, Andrea Mazza Follett, Assistant Attorney General, Jefferson City, MO, Attorneys for Respondent.

## 인용

- 51 S.W.3d 38

## 판결문 요약


ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Jayson D. Hurst appeals from his convictions of assault in the second degree, § 565.060, and armed criminal action, § 571.015.
Judgment affirmed. Rule 30.25(b).
...
